feed.title: Nextcloud Office Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Office: v8.7.1
entry.content:
Fixed

  • fix: Avoid failing on fopen for NonExistingFiles #4830
  • feat(setting): add dark/light iframe CSS vars #4813
  • fix: allow document creation only for users that can edit #4847

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Office: v8.5.8
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Ensure edit permissions are checked before template file token generation by @printminion-co in #4798
  • Guest users inherit edit_group by @elzody in #4831
  • Allow document creation only for users that can edit by @tanyaka in #4846
  • Show statusbar by default for all doc types by @pedropintosilva in #4849
  • Missing translation of guest name dialog by @nickvergessen in #4861
  • Undefined share for preview by @elzody in #4868

Other

  • Dependency updates and NPM audits
  • Use nightly Collabora build for now by @elzody in #4791
  • Unit tests for RegisterTemplateFileCreatorListener by @printminion-co in #4820
  • Use autoload.php for unit tests by @elzody in #4826

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Office: v8.7.2
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Show statusbar by default for all doc types by @pedropintosilva in #4850
  • Missing translation of guest name dialog by @nickvergessen in #4860
  • Undefined share for preview by @elzody in #4869
  • Create new files on public pages for 31+ by @juliusknorr in #4885

Other

  • Bump cypress-split from 1.24.17 to 1.24.18 #4854
  • Update nextcloud/ocp dependency #4864
  • Update nextcloud/ocp dependency #4880

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Office: v8.5.9
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Allow guest display name with a length of up to 255 characters by @blizzz in #4896

Other

  • NPM audits

entry.title: New release for Nextcloud Office: v8.7.3
entry.content:
Fixed

  • Correctly watermark PDFs by @elzody in #4894
  • Allow guest display names with a length of up to 255 characters by @blizzz in #4895

Other

  • Updated nextcloud/ocp dependency #4907
